Bisq is a Layer 2 system built on top of Bitcoin, similar to Lightning, but it focuses on trades instead of payments. Bisq has its own P2P network, just like Lightning, and each "trade channel" is a multisig transaction between the trade parties, similar to a LN "payment channel"
